moves.name: Role Play
moves.description: User copies the opponent's Ability.

moves.name: Encore
moves.description: Forces opponent to keep using its last move for 3 turns.

moves.name: Endeavor
moves.description: Reduces opponent's HP to same as user's.

moves.name: Helping Hand
moves.description: In Double Battles, boosts the power of the partner's move.

moves.name: Uproar
moves.description: User attacks for 3 turns and prevents sleep.

moves.name: Outrage
moves.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

moves.name: Spite
moves.description: The opponent's last move loses 2-5 PP.

moves.name: Covet
moves.description: Opponent's item is stolen by the user.

moves.name: Bulk Up
moves.description: Raises user's Attack and Defense.

moves.name: Aerial Ace
moves.description: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

moves.name: Rock Tomb
moves.description: Lowers opponent's Speed.

moves.name: Overheat
moves.description: Sharply lowers user's Special Attack.

moves.name: Secret Power
moves.description: Effects of the attack vary with the location.

moves.name: Brick Break
moves.description: Breaks through Reflect and Light Screen barriers.

moves.name: Revenge
moves.description: Power increases if user was hit first.

moves.name: Taunt
moves.description: Opponent can only use moves that attack.

moves.name: Focus Punch
moves.description: If the user is hit before attacking, it flinches instead.

moves.name: Facade
moves.description: Power doubles if user is burned, poisoned, or paralyzed.

moves.name: Rain Dance
moves.description: Makes it rain for 5 turns.

moves.name: Earthquake
moves.description: Power is doubled if opponent is underground from using Dig.

moves.name: Beat Up
moves.description: Each Pok√©mon in your party attacks.

moves.name: Rock Smash
moves.description: May lower opponent's Defense.

moves.name: Psych Up
moves.description: Copies the opponent's stat changes.

moves.name: Sunny Day
moves.description: Makes it sunny for 5 turns.

moves.name: Cross Chop
moves.description: High critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Hidden Power
moves.description: Type and power depends on user's IVs.

moves.name: Iron Tail
moves.description: May lower opponent's Defense.

moves.name: Frustration
moves.description: Power decreases with higher Happiness.

moves.name: Return
moves.description: Power increases with user's Happiness.

moves.name: Sleep Talk
moves.description: User performs one of its own moves while sleeping.

moves.name: Attract
moves.description: If opponent is the opposite gender, it's less likely to attack.

moves.name: Swagger
moves.description: Opponent becomes confused, but its Attack is raised two stages.

moves.name: Endure
moves.description: Always left with at least 1 HP, but may fail if used consecutively.

moves.name: Detect
moves.description: Opponent's attack doesn't affect you, but may fail if used often.

moves.name: Foresight
moves.description: Resets opponent's Evasiveness, Normal-type and Fighting-type attacks can now hit Ghosts, and Ghost-type attacks hit Normal.

moves.name: Mud-Slap
moves.description: Lowers opponent's Accuracy.

moves.name: Protect
moves.description: User is not affected by opponent's move.

moves.name: Reversal
moves.description: The lower the user's HP, the higher the power.

moves.name: Curse
moves.description: Ghosts lose 50% of max HP and curse the opponent; Non-Ghosts raise Attack, Defense and lower Speed.

moves.name: Snore
moves.description: Can only be used if asleep. May cause flinching.

moves.name: Thief
moves.description: Also steals opponent's held item.

moves.name: Defense Curl
moves.description: Raises user's Defense.

moves.name: Meditate
moves.description: Raises user's Attack.

moves.name: Headbutt
moves.description: May cause flinching.

moves.name: Ice Punch
moves.description: May freeze opponent.

moves.name: Fire Punch
moves.description: May burn opponent.

moves.name: Screech
moves.description: Sharply lowers opponent's Defense.

moves.name: Low Kick
moves.description: The heavier the opponent, the stronger the attack.

moves.name: Substitute
moves.description: Uses HP to creates a decoy that takes hits.

moves.name: Rock Slide
moves.description: May cause flinching.

moves.name: Rest
moves.description: User sleeps for 2 turns, but user is fully healed.

moves.name: Fury Swipes
moves.description: Hits 2-5 times in one turn.

moves.name: Skull Bash
moves.description: Raises Defense on first turn, attacks on second.

moves.name: Swift
moves.description: Ignores Accuracy and Evasiveness.

moves.name: Metronome
moves.description: User performs any move in the game at random.

moves.name: Bide
moves.description: User takes damage for two turns then strikes back double.

moves.name: Focus Energy
moves.description: Increases critical hit ratio.

moves.name: Double Team
moves.description: Raises user's Evasiveness.

moves.name: Mimic
moves.description: Copies the opponent's last move.

moves.name: Rage
moves.description: Raises user's Attack when hit.

moves.name: Toxic
moves.description: Badly poisons opponent.

moves.name: Dig
moves.description: Digs underground on first turn, attacks on second. Can also escape from caves.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: May paralyze opponent.

moves.name: Thunderbolt
moves.description: May paralyze opponent.

moves.name: Seismic Toss
moves.description: Inflicts damage equal to user's level.

moves.name: Counter
moves.description: When hit by a Physical Attack, user strikes back with 2x power.

moves.name: Submission
moves.description: User receives recoil damage.

moves.name: Leer
moves.description: Lowers opponent's Defense.

moves.name: Double-Edge
moves.description: User receives recoil damage.

moves.name: Thrash
moves.description: User attacks for 2-3 turns but then becomes confused.

moves.name: Take Down
moves.description: User receives recoil damage.

moves.name: Body Slam
moves.description: May paralyze opponent.

moves.name: Pay Day
moves.description: A small amount of money is gained after the battle resolves.

moves.name: Karate Chop
moves.description: High critical hit ratio.
